attributes.action: Up conservation efforts to protect native bee populations from going extinct.
attributes.additional_details: Bees are an integral part of our eco-systems and without them multiple plant species that rely on them to be pollinators, may be under threat. Safeguarding their future could go a long way to protecting native British wildlife for future generations.
attributes.background: Increase Government funding for conservation groups trying to protect bees native to the UK to help secure the their future as a species.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315431
